paragraphs.body: Fanon administrators were Avatar Wiki users who were given some, but not all administrator abilities in order to maintain the fanon section of the site. They were considered the most experienced editors of fan fiction on Avatar Wiki.
paragraphs.text: Fanon administrators were Avatar Wiki users who were given some, but not all administrator abilities in order to maintain the fanon section of the site. They were considered the most experienced editors of fan fiction on Avatar Wiki.

paragraphs.body: Fanon administrators were created as a result of the merge between Avatar Wiki and the ${link_0} in June 2009. The group was disbanded as a result of community consensus in February 2012.
paragraphs.text: Fanon administrators were created as a result of the merge between Avatar Wiki and the Avatar Fanon Wiki in June 2009. The group was disbanded as a result of community consensus in February 2012.
